status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqq1h","text":"Section the brains at   thickness on Leica cryostat (CM1860).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a71qt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"30"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24sfs","text":"Collect the sections in cryoprotectant solution in 12-well plates and store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5k4m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71j72","text":"To make 1000 ml cryoprotectant (from IHCworld.com): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":17}],"data":{}},{"key":"1voc9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chh88","text":"          a  Sucrose  300 g    b  Polyvinyl-pyrrolidone (PVP-40)  10 g    c  0.1M PB  500 ml    d  Ethylene glycol  300 ml  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":124}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ethf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"72A19B94789F11EE9F3F0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ihcworld.com/_protocols/histology/cryoprotectant.htm"}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[48,"263.9973907470703","116.99478912353516"],"data":[["a","Sucrose","300 g"],["b","Polyvinyl-pyrrolidone (PVP-40)","10 g"],["c","0.1M PB","500 ml"],["d","Ethylene glycol","300 ml"]],"guid":"849D8BFE173B4CC7A40A27FA8E95BBEA","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e0c4s","text":"e. Add PVP-40 to 0.1M PB (very slowly- this will take a while to dissolve). Stir to dissolve. Slowly add the sucrose to dissolve, and then add the ethylene glycol and bring the final volume to 1000 ml with 0.1M PB. Store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["a","Sucrose","300 g"],["b","Polyvinyl-pyrrolidone (PVP-40)","10 g"],["c","0.1M PB","500 ml"],["d","Ethylene glycol","300 ml"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88ckg","text":"Wash the sections that are stored in cryoprotectant 3x 10 min prior to beginning and immunostaining protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3o1eb","text":"Wash the sections that are stored in cryoprotectant for   prior to beginning and immunostaining protocols (1/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6pdoj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5uq0","text":"Wash the sections that are stored in cryoprotectant for   prior to beginning and immunostaining protocols (2/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1F27E687789C11EEAE430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98gpo","text":"Wash the sections that are stored in cryoprotectant for   prior to beginning and immunostaining protocols (3/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"22BD9B69789C11EEAE430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pd2l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gt4q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bf6s1","text":"Equilibration: TBS + 0.1% Tx,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":12,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"98r0i","text":"Wash buffer: TBS + 0.1% Triton x-100 (Tx)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"56mg7","text":"Wash 3-4x 2 min with TBS + 0.1% Tx and then twice with TBS alone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30t7r","text":"Wash for   with TBS + 0.1% Tx and then twice with TBS alone (1/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4k8o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61fa8","text":"Wash for   with TBS + 0.1% Tx and then twice with TBS alone (4/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"205836EB789E11EE9F3F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjl7h","text":"Wash for   with TBS + 0.1% Tx and then twice with TBS alone (3/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"1C7AAFF5789E11EE9F3F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91lv7","text":"Wash for   with TBS + 0.1% Tx and then twice with TBS alone (2/4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"155B8AD9789E11EE9F3F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12a4s","text":"Dip sections in ultrapure water again briefly prior to mounting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qetf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"969sb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bgkc","text":"Sections may appear slightly wrinkled after this treatment, but should still be able to be mounted without issue. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lcc5","text":"Incubate in CuSO4 buffer (  CuSO4 in   ammonium acetate buffer,  ) for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1agt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"5"}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e99hh","text":"Fill petri dish with TBS. Have serological pipette and secondary container available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fndc","text":"Place a clean slide in petri dish diagonally, with label resting against the side of the dish, above the level of the solution, and the rest submerged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80g5k","text":"Using fine detail paint brush, lift floating section and gently adhere to slide near the top of the TBS. Can gently tap the section to get it to stick to the slide, or lift one corner of the section along the slide slightly above the water level to help it stick. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eeca","text":"Using serological pipette, gently remove a few mL of TBS, leaving the section adhered to the slide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ts2u","text":"After all sections are mounted, allow excess TBS to dry and then mount using Vectashield mounting medium with DAPI and a glass coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97rnt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4juqv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4d2og","text":"Can replace TBS with PBS if not using antibodies targeting phosphorylated proteins.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
